name: Pixel Havoc
blurb: Ever wanted to create your own video game? Use your Creativity to draw your own levels and characters in Pixel Havoc.

rewards.reward: Player Reward:\r\nAdvanced Pre-Release Copy of Pixel Havoc (One week before the world wide debut of Pixel Havoc, and additionally will have full access to the final release of the game).

Supporter Reward:\r\nCredited in the "Special Thanks" Section (In the credits for Pixel Havoc your name organization, message or tribute will be proudly displayed in the section "Special Thanks"--- and we do mean it too. Thank You!). Additionally the Player Reward.

Beta Tester Reward: Credited "Beta Tester" (In the credits for Pixel Havoc your name, organization, message or tribute will be proudly displayed along side those that helped in the testing and development of Pixel Havoc.) + Access to the Cryogenic Developers Network (The Cryogenic Developers Network will allow beta testers to have the ability to contact the developers of Pixel Havoc, report suggestions and errors in real time, have access to the newest content in development as soon as it is available, and the ability to join and participate in periodic live chat and screen casting) + Access to the Beta Release of Pixel Havoc Weeks before its official release. Additionally the Player Reward.

Collector Reward:\r\nLimited Edition Poster Signed by the Cryogenic Team. Additionally the Beta Tester and Player Rewards. *Outside of the US please add an additional $10 dollars to your pledge for shipping and handling, thank you.

Game Content Designer Reward:\r\nCredited "Game Content Designer" + Responsible to name a character in Pixel Havoc (The Game Content Designer will be responsible to name one (1)  NPC in the single player story campaign). Additionally the Collector, Beta Tester, and Player Rewards.

Level Designer Reward:\r\nCredited "Level Designer" + Advanced Pre-Release Access to the Pixel Havoc Level Editor. + One (1) Level of your creation will be added to the final release of Pixel Havoc. Additionally the Collector, Beta Tester, and Player Rewards.

Character Artist Reward:\r\n Credited "Character Artist" + Advanced Pre-Release Access to the Pixel Havoc Character Editor. + One (1) Character of your creation will be added to the game. Additionally the Collector, Beta Tester, and Player Rewards.

Game Publisher Reward: Credited "Game Publisher" + Your Logo, Picture or Advertisement proudly displayed in the credits. Don't have a Logo, Picture or Advertisement? We will make you one that conforms with Cryogenic Entertainments High Standards Of Quality. Additionally ALL other Rewards.
